title: Bridges in Holland
creator_credit: Rolf Orthel, Bert Haanstra and Bert Haanstra Film Productions
brief_description: A tribute to Holland’s bridge builders; a beautifully photographed study of the texture and structure of bridges to present a view of Holland in all seasons in all parts. The assembly of shots of bridges from opening ceremonies to demolition tell their own story without commentary. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
